Articles.Content: Can't login in to my other account and hate to make a new one

20 hours ago, Ssoulreaperr647 said:

Can't login in to my other account and hate to make a new one 

Please explain. Are you on Xbox, PS, PC? What is the exact problem you have, can you not login to your XB/PS accounts, whether because of a forgotten password, or because of some background system in play. In order to help, I need more than I can't log in. Especially considering that this particular forum side covers both XB and PS.
